tests.name: filter by author
statements: CREATE STREAM all_publications (author VARCHAR, title VARCHAR) WITH (kafka_topic = 'publication_events', partitions = 1, key = 'author', value_format = 'avro');
CREATE STREAM george_martin WITH (kafka_topic = 'george_martin_books', partitions = 1) AS SELECT author, title FROM all_publications WHERE author = 'George R. R. Martin';
